live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37231.summary: Some customers in Squamish are experiencing an interruption to Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37231.title: May 11 – Squamish, Whistler, Bowen Island & Surrounding | Phone Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 11:30 AM. Please stay tuned for updates.
37232.summary: Some customers in the Temple area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37232.title: May 11 – Calgary (Temple) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
